sen.j: 煕子女王（きし（ひろこ）じょおう、生年不詳 - 天暦4年5月5日（950年5月24日））は、保明親王（醍醐天皇皇太子）第一王女。
sen.e: Princess Kishi (Hiroko) (date of birth unknown - May 24, 950) was a princess royal of Imperial Prince Yasuakira (Emperor Daigo's son).

sen.j: 延長元年（923年）、父・保明親王が皇太子のまま21歳の若さで薨去し、その後を追うように同3年（925年）、兄慶頼王も幼くして死没した。
sen.e: In 923, her father, Imperial Prince Yasuakira passed away remaining to be a prince royal at the age of 21, after that her older brother, Yoshiyori also passed away in his infancy in 925.

sen.j: 相次ぐ後継者の死に、祖父醍醐天皇や周囲は菅原道真の祟りと恐れたという。
sen.e: Facing a spate of heir's deaths, their grandfather, Emperor Daigo and others were scared of SUGAWARA no Michizane's curse.

sen.e: In February 937, she got married to her uncle, Emperor Suzaku and was proclaimed to be a nyogo.

sen.j: 天慶元年（938年）12月、従四位下に叙される。
sen.e: In December 938, she was given the rank of Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 天慶8年（945年）、母・藤原仁善子が逝去。
sen.e: In 945, her mother, FUJIWARA no Nizeko passed away.

sen.j: 天暦4年（950年）5月5日、一人娘の昌子内親王を出産、従三位に進むが同日薨去。
sen.e: She gave birth to her only daughter, Imperial Princess Shoshi (Masako) on May 5, 950 and was promoted to the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Grade), but she passed away on that day.
